Solo queuing is fun and playing with friends is enjoyable. (It's even better if it's someone who can teach you how to play!)

Competitive is the most fun game mode, so don't put off playing it, even if you're shy about your skills.

I don't play as much as I used to though because I found that it was quite a time sink to stay sharp, let alone get better at the game. (I didn't like slipping backwards, but I also had other things I had to invest the time in.)
虽然还是有外挂，但是比起其他游戏公平性较好，而且画质十分好。
